site_name: The Wall at 1 Coldharbour, Isle House
description: 1. Remove and dispose existing metal ladder, timber fenders (horizontal and vertical), fixtures and fittings. 2. Remediation of core holes in wall (undertaken during Site Investigation)3. Grout filling of small voids behind the lower part of the wall 4. Removal and dispose urgent (temporary) works (sandbags at the toe of the wall filled with a 4:1 sand/ cement mix)5. Steel sheet toe piles 3m long, 0.5m to 1.0m in front of the existing foundation6. Remove and dispose of horizontal timber capping (foundation) and detritus7. Concrete infill (timber foundation encapsulation and cavity infill)8. Foreshore protection will comprise Kyowa filter units (ballast filled net gabions) installed in line with the manufacturer's recommendations.9. Remedial works to vertical crack in adjacent wall using stainless steel staple bars
